results.content:
This course shows only some basic concepts of jQuery, but to much time is wasted on HTML and CSS. Title says: "... To Advanced", and that may not be the truth. After this course, we have some "ready" elements to use, but no understending of jQuery. For some "beginners" it may be a problem. I'm a little advanced in pure JS, and I wanted to understad how jQuery works, not how to only use it.

But a few lectures shows nice ways to select DOM elements with $(), so I'm not disappointed so much :)
